title: Data shows Android losing ground to iOS, but Google’s platform still dominates the market
content:
Android is unsurprisingly the most popular mobile operating system in the world, as it’s available on a huge variety of devices. However, data from StockApps shows that iOS has been taking Android’s market share in recent years – although Google’s platform still dominates the market.

more…

The post Data shows Android losing ground to iOS, but Google’s platform still dominates the market appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Data from StockApps shows that iOS has been taking Android's market share in recent years, but Google's platform still dominates the market.
